author: Julian Conradson
title: “Spook Who Cried Wolf”: Matt Gaetz Introduces Resolution to Strip Security Clearances From Dozens of Intelligence Officials Who Falsely Labeled Hunter’s ‘Laptop From Hell’ as “Russian Disinformation”

sentence: The Republican’s proposal reads, “The 51 signatories of the letter who publicly and falsely decried Hunter Biden’s laptop to be Russian disinformation should be barred from holding any level of security clearances indefinitely.” Gaetz’s resolution is co-sponsored so far by fellow Republican Reps. Thomas Massie, Dan Bishop, Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, Louie Gohmert, and Marjorie Taylor Greene.
